movie_title: Fever Feels Horrible, but is Actually Awesome!
introduction: To get started planning a fulfilling career that does a lot of good, go to https://80000hours.org/in

vocabulary.definition: to forcibly put an end to something
vocabulary.example: The medicine helped suppress the fever and reduce the discomfort.

vocabulary.definition: methods or systems used to protect against harm or attack
vocabulary.example: The body's immune defenses fought off the invading virus.

vocabulary.definition: the process of adjusting to new conditions
vocabulary.example: The fever is seen as an evolutionary adaptation to combat infections.
During a fever, the body's internal thermostat increases to fight off illness.

vocabulary.definition: a localized physical condition in which part of the body becomes reddened, swollen, hot, and often painful
vocabulary.example: The fever led to inflammation at the infection site, aiding in the healing process.

vocabulary.definition: relating to moral principles or the branch of knowledge dealing with these
vocabulary.example: There are ethical concerns regarding the use of anti-fever drugs in certain patient populations.
